aboutMe.content: I specialize in React, NextJs, TypeScript, REST and GraphQL, but I'm also comfortable working with various JavaScript frontend and backend frameworks like Express and Nest. With a blend of technical skills and practical experience across various industries, I focus on delivering functional and high-quality software solutions tailored to business needs.

My coding journey began seven years ago when I built my first photography blog using HTML and Markdown, eventually diving into JavaScript. This curiosity led me to pursue a career as a Software Developer.

During my early years, I worked with platforms like WordPress and Shopify for e-commerce. To deepen my Front-End skills, I attended the Upgrade Hub bootcamp, where I learned to build Single Page Applications using Angular and React and developed APIs and backend systems with Node and Express.

Most recently, I worked as a Software Developer at the Alexander von Humboldt Institute for Internet and Society, where I developed a consent agent for managing cookie preferences and conducted A/B testing to evaluate design impacts. Before that, I contributed to Hashtag-You, building and optimizing e-commerce websites for different markets, improving checkout flows, and integrating custom services. At Unea, I was involved in setting up project architectures from scratch and implementing a variety of app features for SaaS applications. My background also includes freelance work as a web developer and several years managing and developing e-commerce solutions for Style Aristos.

experience.company: Law and Innovation Technology, Alexander von Humboldt Institute for Internet and Society
experience.description: An academic spin-off and research project. Developed a consent agent and cookie banner (initially integrated in a browser extension) that lets consumers manage their cookie consent across the web. Conducted a quantitative A/B user test with 11 groups using different design combinations  and to measure how this differences impact the users consent rates.

Web development of e-commerce websites for DE, FR and IT markets. Led improvements and custom implementations  over the shopping cart and checkout, enhancing conversion rates.Implemented of new layouts in Product Detail Pages and Landing Pages for product launches.Integrated new Shopify Apps and custom services.

Set up project architecture from day 0, including CI/CD environments, pipelines, and deployments. Implemented a broad set of app features, from dashboards to CRUD inventory operations, design iterations, new library integrations, and scheduling and event management.

Managed the company website and WooCommerce marketplace. Responsibilities included SEO optimization, stock management, and generating sales reports. This role marked the beginning of my web development journey, where I started using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a professional environment.
